review_data.title: Around the corner from the main station
review_data.content: This is an unassuming Italian restaurant with good food and friendly service. Just minutes away from the main trainstation. Good place to meet.

review_data.title: Naja

review_data.title: Great little place
review_data.content: Found this place our first night in Zurich. Close to our hotel. They were very nice to accommodate our party of 10, with no reservation. Everything was good, hot and fresh. The wait staff was friendly and attentive. Would recommend this place when in Zurich.

review_data.title: Surprising Good
review_data.content: Had dinner here and surprising all our food was good. Service was quite fast eventhou there was only one staff at that time but then again when we were there the restaurant was not full. Setup of the restaurant was a bit dark.

review_data.title: Fantastic Italian food
review_data.content: We ate Tuscan spaghetti (has veal, bacon, tomatoes), and spaghetti carbornara for our meals. Both had really deep, rich flavors. Glass of wine at a reasonable price; fresh salad ingredients. We were impressed enough with our first night's meal to stop for a pizza on...More

review_data.title: Fantastic Experience!!!
review_data.content: Amazing Pizza!!! We eat pizza all over the world and this one is unique and delicious. We had red wine too and the flavor was so warm and cozy, just like fall. Dessert was exceptional too. Nuray Manaz is a wonderful server with awesome recommendations...More

review_data.title: Worst Lasagna on trip
review_data.content: Took a day trip from Lake Como to Zurich (fast train). Decided to have lunch at this restaurant. Food was below average and also service and wine. Cost of the lunch was exorbitant. Ended up going across the road to the Cafe on the corner,...More

review_data.title: Friendly service, okay lunch

review_data.title: A-ok!

review_data.title: dark restaurant, average service, food ok
review_data.content: dark, very moderate restaurant with for the service & food very high prices. Service very moderate; very noisy space; will not come back

review_data.title: Lovely dinner
review_data.content: Food was excellent! Good vibes! Staff were very friendly and accommodating. Good portion sizes. Prices were not cheap as can be expected in Zurich. But a lovely end to the day.

review_data.title: Nice dinner in Zurich
review_data.content: Had a very nice dinner here with my wife. No pressure, professional and accommodating waiter. I had chicken and vegetables and my wife had a pizza. The glass of Italian table wine was acceptable. Overall, relaxed, bordering on romantic, quiet nice evening.

review_data.title: Surprisingly tasty bolognese
review_data.content: It was about to rain so I wanted something close to my hotel. I have been there before but never reviewed it. It was quite busy but service was still pretty quick - good for someone eating solo. The food is very reasonably priced and...More

review_data.title: Dinner between trains
review_data.content: My wife and I had from 600-830pm to change trains between arriving from Milan and taking an overnight to Amsterdam. Wheeling our heavy cases, we did not want to walk far and were pleased to find this place about 200m from the station. We had...More

review_data.title: Bella Italia
review_data.content: Superleckeres Italienisches Restaurant sehr zentral in Zürich. Leckere Pizzen und freundliches Personal - ganz wie in bella Italia

review_data.title: Good Value, Good Location
review_data.content: Big selection of good Italian food at relatively modest prices (considering the location next to Zurich's main station). At lunchtime it's always quite full, in the evening it's a bit quieter, so it's an excellent place for a quiet conversation with a good meal. Good...More

review_data.title: One of the best Pizza Calzone....
review_data.content: Found this place by chance looking for somewhere to eat. Ordered Pizza Calzone and amongst its ingredients was egg! Was surprised when I started eating it... Turned out to be a fried egg in the middle! Absolutely gorgeous, loved every biteful.

review_data.title: Good italian restaurant close to Zurich railway station
